import React, { Component } from 'react'; import BootstrapModal from '../partials/BootstrapModal'; class UserAddEdit extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { username: "", email: "", password: "", first_name: "", last_name: "", groups: [], error_message: {}, msg_success: "", modalTitle: (this.props.addFlag === true ? 'User Add' : 'User Edit') }; } render() { return (
{this.props.editFlag === true ? : '' } {this.props.addFlag === true ? : '' }
); } } export default UserAddEdit;
